original_text: The governor answered and said unto them, Whether of the twain will ye that I release unto you? They said, Barabbas.
korean_text: 총독이 대답하여 이르되 둘 중의 누구를 너희에게 놓아 주기를 원하느냐 이르되 바라바로소이다

sentences.original_text: The governor answered and said unto them,
Whether of the twain will ye that I release unto you?
